description:
Our team provides Site Reliability Engineering support to Enterprise applications within Google, powering key areas (i.e. Finance, Legal, Supply Chain and People Operations).

With your technical expertise, you'll design, implement and improve processes, procedures and automation for all infrastructure-centric areas. You will also test the systems in place along with interfacing with external groups.

Behind everything our users see online is the architecture built by the Technical Infrastructure team to keep it running. From developing and maintaining our data centers to building the next generation of Google platforms, we make Google's product portfolio possible. We're proud to be our engineers' engineers and love voiding warranties by taking things apart so we can rebuild them. We're always on call to keep our networks up and running, ensuring our users have the best and fastest experience possible.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BS degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience designing, installation and managing large-scale SAP S/4 HANA,GRC, Solution Manager, TMS/Charm, BW, BW4/HANA, MDG.
  • Coding experience in one of Shell scripting, Go or Python, C, C++, Java.
  • Experience with Linux and SQL.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience with Google Cloud Platform.
  • Experience administering SAP Business Suite in HA and DR environments, Cloud Connector and integration platforms (PI/PO, SDI, DS, etc), automation for SAP patching.
  • Coding experience in ABAP.
  • Proven mastery of troubleshooting techniques and ability to analyze and resolve difficult technical issues quickly in a high pressure environment.
responsibilities:
• Engineer and run SAP infrastructure to meet performance, security, high availability, scalability and other requirements.
  • Interact with business analysts and developers to ensure the overall infrastructure design of business applications meets requirements of performance, security and high availability.
  • Perform operational DBE duties in a large-scale, complex environment will include the following: patching, environments cloning, database and application upgrades, implementing backup and monitoring procedures.
  • Analyze performance issues in the application and database tiers of SAP installations. Assist developers with performance tuning.
  • Work with third-party vendor products teams (SAP and partners) to resolve any issues.
title: Administrator, SAP Hana Basis
